channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This van broke down several weeks ago and has been left here in a very difficult position. Cars turning into this v busy lane as it’s used as a cut through, on the wrong side of the road. They are then reversing back towards the main road . Many people are now complaining about the difficulty of where this van has been left . It’s compounded by the fact that people , incl children use this lane to walk down to school, 12th September
item.description:
Farm lane is small - it’s right at the entrance as you turn off church road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rework to road surface is worse than before!!, 12th September
item.description:
As of 11/09/2025 the rework done to this stretch of road is now worse than the dip itself was! Driving at 45mph could have caused serious damage to my car. Today I approached at 30mph and it’s just as dangerous! The tarmac hasn’t been smoothed to a level surface so it’s like driving over several ramps! If my cars suspension goes, I will send you the bill. Please sort this out properly once and for all!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
